bibl.title: Alexandria: A History and a Guide. Introduction by Lawrence Durrell.
bibl.note: First British edition (reprinting the first Alexandrian edition, 1922 and including E.M. Forster's Introduction to the edition published in New York, 1961), with a new Introduction by Lawrence Durrell, and with Afterword and Notes by Michael Haag.
